00059 #ifndef HEADER_IDEA_H
00060 #define HEADER_IDEA_H
00061 
00062 #ifdef OPENSSL_NO_IDEA
00063 #error IDEA is disabled.
00064 #endif
00065 
00066 #define IDEA_ENCRYPT    1
00067 #define IDEA_DECRYPT    0
00068 
00069 #include <openssl/opensslconf.h> /* IDEA_INT */
00070 #define IDEA_BLOCK  8
00071 #define IDEA_KEY_LENGTH 16
00072

00075 #endif

00077 typedef struct idea_key_st
00078     {
00079     IDEA_INT data[9][6];
00080     } IDEA_KEY_SCHEDULE;

00082 const char *idea_options(void);

00084     IDEA_KEY_SCHEDULE *ks);

00086 void idea_set_decrypt_key(IDEA_KEY_SCHEDULE *ek, IDEA_KEY_SCHEDULE *dk);

00088     long length, IDEA_KEY_SCHEDULE *ks, unsigned char *iv,int enc);
00089 void idea_cfb64_encrypt(const unsigned char *in, unsigned char *out,
00090     long length, IDEA_KEY_SCHEDULE *ks, unsigned char *iv,
00091     int *num,int enc);

00093     long length, IDEA_KEY_SCHEDULE *ks, unsigned char *iv, int *num);
